Game works fine for me so far, but the low volume and lack of voices in the cutscenes is a breaker for me. I saw Shroo wrote that the voices are there, but not reading. Hopefully this can be fixed! If not I'll have to DL the bigger version. Anyway, TPTB releases have always been great for me, and the 50% video downgrade is standard. Never knew it to mess with the audio though. I know subtitles can be turned on in the menu, but I want to hear the characters.
Also the 1.1 update has optimizations. Hopefully than can be worked on as well because the game is pretty poor on that front even with a great machine. (Which I have.)

tbh i dont know how the registry looks for this game ... yet! since im downloading the full version atm.

But as of what i could find on the internet
its something like

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Aspyr\Star Wars The Force Unleashed]
"Path"="{PATH}"
"AppFile"="{PATH}\\SWTFU.exe"
"Language"="en"

and i believe if you add this in your registry
and replace  {PATH} with the actual path to the game you should be able to update the rip without any problems if any problems occur plz let me know

IFF SETUP.BAT DONT WORK FOR YOU ...
1 OPEN SETUP.BAT WITH EDITOR
2 COPY AND PASTE THE TEXT BELOW ...
3 SAVE AND RUN SETUP.BAT NOW
4 YOU WILL SEE WHAT YOUR PC WORK

HERE THE TEXT TO PASTE ...

@echo off
cls
echo *                           Star Wars The Force Unleashed                     *
echo *                           !!20.0GB Of Space Required !!                     *
echo *                         !! 15-25 min for Decompression !!                   *
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data2.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data3.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data4.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data5.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data6.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data7.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data8.tptb 
echo.
tptb.dll x -y data9.tptb 
echo.
zip.dll x -y FMV.zip 
echo.
#Soft#\vc80_redist\Vcredist_x86.exe /q:a /c:"msiexec /i vcredist.msi /qn /l*v %temp%\vcredist_x86.log" 
#Soft#\DirectX\dxwebsetup.exe 
ren bin.dll bin.exe 
bin.exe 
echo.
ren regsetup.dll regsetup.txt 
ren reg.dll reg.exe 
reg.exe 
echo.
echo         All, done Have fun!

to get better performance install the patch 1.1. but to do it, it's necessary add this code to registry (in my case i install the game in the folder D:\Star Wars The Force Unleashed, put the current folder that u installed the game:

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Aspyr\Star Wars The Force Unleashed]
"Path"="D:\Star Wars The Force Unleashed"
"AppFile"="D:\Star Wars The Force Unleashed\SWTFU.exe"
"Language"="en"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Aspyr\Star Wars The Force Unleashed]
"Path"="D:\Star Wars The Force Unleashed"
"AppFile"="D:\Star Wars The Force Unleashed\SWTFU.exe"
"Language"="en"
